ValidationRule.description: Prevents users (except sys-admin/accounting profiles) from editing invoices that are marked Ready for Billing, Final, or Pending. Also prevents Collections from revising invoices unless they have been synced to Timberline.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT(ISCHANGED(AE_1_Bonus__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(AE_2_Bonus__c)),
OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), 'In Process')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'In Process')) ),
NOT(AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), 'In Process'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Ready for Billing'))),
NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Accounting")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invoices can only be edited while they are 'In Process'. Please contact accounting with any questions.
